incidents.name: Brief degradation to several Twilio services

incident_updates.body: Between 1:58 PM and 2:06 PM Pacific on 16 December, customers accessing Messaging Insights, Audit Insights, Billing Insights, Alarms, Intelligent Alerts, Monitor Events, and the Numbers Console may have received errors. This issue has been resolved.

incidents.name: Increased 404 for Transcripts

incident_updates.body: Twilio voice was degraded for 4 minutes between 22:10 and 22:14 Pacific Time on 12/16/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced ncreased 404 for Transcripts. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: SuperSim and Programmable Wireless Degradation

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing the issue with the billing pipeline. Super SIM UI customers are getting accessed without any delays. There is no delay for usage and billing reports. Programmable Wireless customers are not facing delays while provisioning activities. This incident has been resolved.

We are observing recovery in the issue with the billing pipeline. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing the issue with the billing pipeline. The bug in software caused the billing information to be delayed on the UI and API. The team is still working to identify the issue. We will post the update in the next 2 hours or sooner if more information will become available.
We are still investigating the issue. We will provide further updates as and when we get more information about this.

Impacted Services: Access to Super SIM UI and delays with usage and billing reporting and Programmable Wireless Provisioning
Start: Wednesday, December 11, 2024 05:30 UTC / Wednesday, December 11, 2024 00:30 EST (UTC-5)
Beginning at 05:30 UTC, customers will experience issues as indicated below:
For Super SIM: Customers will face issues accessing the Super SIM UI accessing via console.korewireless.com, and experience delays with usage and billing reporting
For Programmable Wireless customers may encounter delays in provisioning activities

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures To Smartfren Telecom Network In Indonesia

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing SMS Delivery Failures To Smartfren Telecom Network In Indonesia. This incident has been resolved.

We are observing recovery in SMS Delivery Failures To Smartfren Telecom Network In Indonesia. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Smartfren Telecom Network in Indonesia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Smartfren Telecom Network in Indonesia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Smartfren Telecom Network in Indonesia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue SMS Delivery Failures To Smartfren Telecom Network In Indonesia. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
